resources.string: Use features to track time, mark ingredients, and follow cooking steps
Create and add ingredients or other items needed for cooking to shopping lists
Add recipes to categories, filter, sort, and use search to quickly find the recipe you need
Store your recipes remotely by logging into your account or locally without signing in
Welcome back! Log in to your account
enter each ingredient on a new line
enter cooking steps on new lines
Change the password for the current account
*You can mark steps by tapping on them.
*You can mark ingredients by tapping on them. Unmarked ingredients will be added to the shopping list
Are you sure you want to log out of your Receptory account?
To use the app again, you will have to log in to your account again

Before using the application, please read the terms of the following User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement"). The Agreement governs the relationship between Individual Entrepreneur Viktor Aleksandrovich Sergienko (OGRN: 316619600084691, INN: 616122984323) — hereinafter referred to as the "Administration" — and an individual using the mobile application "Receptory", hereinafter referred to as the "User".
The application was developed by order of the Administration.
By installing and using the application, the User confirms that they have read, understood, and agree to comply with the terms of this Agreement.
This Agreement defines the general procedure and relations between the Administration, which holds the exclusive rights to the mobile application "Receptory", and the User using the Application. This Agreement is a public offer in accordance with Article 437 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation, addressed to individuals on the terms of this Agreement.
IF YOU USE (DOWNLOAD, INSTALL, RUN, OR OTHERWISE USE) THE MOBILE APPLICATION "RECEPTORY", OR ANY PART OF IT, YOU CONFIRM THAT YOU HAVE FULLY READ, UNDERSTOOD, AGREED TO, AND ACCEPT THIS USER AGREEMENT, THE PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING AND PROTECTION POLICY, AND OTHER DOCUMENTS REFERENCED IN THIS AGREEMENT, WITHOUT EXCEPTION OR RESERVATION, AND YOU AGREE TO COMPLY WITH AND BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY VIOLATIONS.
By agreeing to the terms of this Agreement, the User confirms their legal capacity, the accuracy of their personal data, and assumes full responsibility for their accuracy and completeness. Based on Federal Law No. 152-FZ "On Personal Data" dated July 27, 2006, the Administration processes the personal data of registered Users in accordance with the principles and rules for processing and protecting personal data. Under this Agreement, the User gives consent to the processing of their personal data provided during registration.
 By accepting the terms of this Agreement, the User also consents to receive information regarding the operation of the Application and its Services, including receiving such information within the Application.

This Agreement governs the procedure for using the \"Receptory\" mobile application, its services, rights, and obligations of the User and the Administration, as well as other features of the application.\n
3. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES:

The User undertakes to:
–Use the Application only for lawful purposes and in accordance with this Agreement.
–Not use the Application in a manner that may interfere with its proper operation or infringe on the rights of third parties.
–Not distribute or copy the Application or its components, nor modify or attempt to access its source code.
–Independently ensure the confidentiality of their login data, and bear responsibility for all actions performed using their account.
The Administration has the right to:
–Update, change, or discontinue the Application or any of its parts without prior notice to the User.
–Restrict the User's access to the Application in the event of a violation of the terms of this Agreement.

The Application is provided "as is", without any guarantees from the Administration regarding its functionality, relevance, or suitability for specific purposes.
The Administration is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses arising from the use or inability to use the Application, including in cases of data loss, device malfunction, or unauthorized access to the User's data.
The Administration is not responsible for failures in the operation of the Application caused by force majeure circumstances or actions of third parties.

All exclusive rights to the Application, its design, code, name, and other components belong to the Administration or are used by it on legal grounds.
The User has the right to use the Application only within the scope of functionality provided by the Administration.
Any copying, distribution, modification, or other use of the Application or its components without the written consent of the Administration is prohibited.

The Administration processes the User's personal data in accordance with Federal Law No. 152-FZ "On Personal Data".
By accepting the terms of this Agreement, the User gives their voluntary consent to the processing of personal data necessary for the use of the Application.
The Administration undertakes to ensure the confidentiality and security of the User's personal data and not to transfer it to third parties without the User’s consent, except in cases provided by law.

This Agreement may be changed by the Administration without prior notice to the User. The current version of the Agreement is available in the Application.
If the User does not agree with the changes made, they must stop using the Application.
All disputes arising under this Agreement shall be resolved in accordance with the current legislation of the Russian Federation.

This Privacy Policy applies to the mobile application "Receptory" (hereinafter referred to as the "App"), provided by Sole Proprietor Viktor Aleksandrovich Sergienko (hereinafter referred to as the "Service Provider") as a free service. The App is provided "as is".\n
The App uses third-party services that may also collect data. Please refer to their privacy policies:
- Google Analytics for Firebase Privacy Policy\n
You can stop data collection by uninstalling the App from your device using the standard uninstall process.\n
The Service Provider retains your data for as long as you use the App and for a reasonable period after deletion. To request deletion of your personal data, contact: vavlab@list.ru.\n
The Service Provider implements physical, electronic, and organizational safeguards to protect your data.\n

This policy may be updated from time to time. All changes will be posted on this page. You are advised to review it periodically. By continuing to use the App after changes, you agree to the updated policy.
By clicking the “Sign Up” button or signing in with Google, you agree to

Password must contain digits and letters
Email and password must not be empty
